communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Policies, Procedures, and Directives: All current written policies, procedures, directives, guidelines, or post orders regarding:
Pretrial detention of arrestees, including timing requirements for probable cause determinations
Bond setting eligibility, conditions, or procedures that differ for out-of-state versus in-state arrestees
Use of commercial surety bond companies
Release procedures and authorization protocols
Any policies governing the 48-hour constitutional detention limit
2: Training & Instruction – Any training materials, handouts, slide decks, manuals, or written instructions provided to jail staff regarding:
Constitutional detention limits and probable cause requirements
Bond procedures for non-resident arrestees
3: Communications – Any memoranda, directives, or internal communications (including emails or bulletins) regarding bond procedures for non-resident arrestees.
4: Contracts & Agreements – Any contracts, agreements, or fee arrangements currently in effect with commercial bonding companies.
5: Audit & Compliance Records – Any internal audit reports, inspection results, or compliance reviews regarding detention policies conducted within the past ten (10) years. 

These items are requested only to the extent they exist and are maintained in the normal course of business.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Whitley Accountabity Project

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records relating to probable cause determinations for warrantless arrests processed through Whitley County courts from January 1, 2023 through December 31, 2024:

1. Data Export: An electronic export (spreadsheet or CSV format) of all entries relating to probable cause determinations for warrantless arrests, containing the following fields (if maintained):
Case number / cause number
Defendant's full name
Defendant's city and state of residence (or last known address, with street number redacted if needed)
Date and time of arrest
Warrant-based or warrantless arrest indicator
Date and time of probable cause determination signed
Name and title of judicial officer who signed the probable cause determination
Scheduled date and time of initial hearing/appearance
Actual date and time initial hearing was conducted (if different from scheduled)
Bond type (surety, cash, recognizance, etc.)
Bond amount
Any notation or code indicating residency status (in-state vs. out-of-state)

2. Policy & Procedure Records: Any active or historical administrative orders, local court rules, or written policies governing:
Constitutional timeframes for probable cause determinations (including the 48-hour requirement)
Scheduling procedures and protocols for probable cause hearings
Weekend, holiday, and after-hours procedures for judicial determinations
Bail/bond conditions for out-of-state defendants
The use of commercial surety bonds vs. cash or recognizance bonds

3. Scheduling Records: Any logs, calendars, or records showing:
How probable cause hearings are scheduled and by whom
Standard scheduling practices for warrantless arrests
Any backlogs or delays in scheduling PC determinations
Judicial officer availability for probable cause determinations

4. Metadata or Data Dictionary: If the requested data fields are maintained under different names in your system, please provide a list of the field names and their definitions. If any requested field is not maintained, please identify which fields are unavailable.

These items are requested only to the extent they are recorded in the normal course of business.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Whitley Accountabity Project
